events.name: Over 200 Indonesian Children Die After Ingesting Contaminated Cough Syrup
events.wd_label: Over 200 Indonesian Children Die After Ingesting Contaminated Cough Syrup
events.wd_description: More than 200 Indonesian children have died after consuming cough syrup contaminated with hazardous ingredients. Families are pursuing legal action against the government and pharmaceutical companies, seeking accountability and improved safety standards.
events.description: More than 200 Indonesian children have died after consuming cough syrup contaminated with hazardous ingredients. Families are pursuing legal action against the government and pharmaceutical companies, seeking accountability and improved safety standards.

events.name: Contaminated Cough Syrup
events.wd_description: Over 200 children in Indonesia died after ingesting cough syrup contaminated with excessive levels of diethylene glycol and ethylene glycol, leading to severe health complications.
events.description: Over 200 children in Indonesia died after ingesting cough syrup contaminated with excessive levels of diethylene glycol and ethylene glycol, leading to severe health complications.

events.name: Legal Action by Affected Families
events.wd_description: Twenty-five parents have filed a class action lawsuit against Indonesia's health ministry, food and drug agency, and several pharmaceutical companies, seeking justice for their children's deaths and suffering.
events.description: Twenty-five parents have filed a class action lawsuit against Indonesia's health ministry, food and drug agency, and several pharmaceutical companies, seeking justice for their children's deaths and suffering.

events.name: Calls for Government Responsibility and Support
events.wd_label: Calls for Government Responsibility and Support
events.wd_description: The affected families are demanding that the incident be designated as an "extraordinary event," requiring the government to fully fund treatment costs and improve production and illness control standards.
events.description: The affected families are demanding that the incident be designated as an "extraordinary event," requiring the government to fully fund treatment costs and improve production and illness control standards.

events.name: Israeli Army Raid in Jericho
events.wd_description: Multiple Palestinian militants were killed during an Israeli army raid near Jericho, targeting a Hamas terrorist cell responsible for a recent gun attack on a restaurant near a Jewish settlement.
events.description: Multiple Palestinian militants were killed during an Israeli army raid near Jericho, targeting a Hamas terrorist cell responsible for a recent gun attack on a restaurant near a Jewish settlement.

events.name: Israeli Army Raid
events.wd_description: The Israeli Defense Force (IDF) conducted a raid in the Aqabat Jabr refugee camp near Jericho, aiming to arrest members of a Hamas terrorist cell involved in a gun attack.
events.description: The Israeli Defense Force (IDF) conducted a raid in the Aqabat Jabr refugee camp near Jericho, aiming to arrest members of a Hamas terrorist cell involved in a gun attack.

events.name: Death Toll and Arrests
events.wd_description: The raid resulted in the deaths of multiple Palestinian militants, with reports indicating five fatalities, and the arrest of eight individuals by the IDF.
events.description: The raid resulted in the deaths of multiple Palestinian militants, with reports indicating five fatalities, and the arrest of eight individuals by the IDF.

events.name: Witness Reports
events.wd_description: Witnesses reported hearing multiple gunshots during the raid, and the IDF confirmed that the targeted militants were involved in the recent attack on a restaurant.
events.description: Witnesses reported hearing multiple gunshots during the raid, and the IDF confirmed that the targeted militants were involved in the recent attack on a restaurant.

events.name: Honduras Moves to Establish Official Relations with China
events.wd_label: Honduras Moves to Establish Official Relations with China
events.wd_description: Honduran President Xiomara Castro announced her decision to establish official relations with China, effectively ending the country's diplomatic ties with Taiwan, reducing Taiwan's allies to 13.
events.description: Honduran President Xiomara Castro announced her decision to establish official relations with China, effectively ending the country's diplomatic ties with Taiwan, reducing Taiwan's allies to 13.

events.name: Honduras' Decision
events.wd_description: Honduran President Xiomara Castro instructed the foreign minister to establish official relations with China, which would lead to the end of the country's diplomatic ties with Taiwan.
events.description: Honduran President Xiomara Castro instructed the foreign minister to establish official relations with China, which would lead to the end of the country's diplomatic ties with Taiwan.

events.name: Taiwan's Response
events.wd_description: Taiwan's foreign ministry expressed serious concern over Honduras' decision and urged the country to reconsider its position, as the move would further isolate Taiwan diplomatically.
events.description: Taiwan's foreign ministry expressed serious concern over Honduras' decision and urged the country to reconsider its position, as the move would further isolate Taiwan diplomatically.

events.name: China's Response
events.wd_description: China's foreign ministry welcomed Honduras' decision and expressed willingness to develop friendly and cooperative relations with the country.
events.description: China's foreign ministry welcomed Honduras' decision and expressed willingness to develop friendly and cooperative relations with the country.

events.name: Increase in North America’s EV battery manufacturing capacity
events.wd_label: Increase in North America’s EV battery manufacturing capacity
events.wd_description: A significant increase in North America's battery manufacturing capacity from 55 GWh/year in 2021 to nearly 1,000 GWh/year by 2030. This expansion is expected to support the production of 10 to 13 million all-electric vehicles annually by 2030.
events.description: A significant increase in North America's battery manufacturing capacity from 55 GWh/year in 2021 to nearly 1,000 GWh/year by 2030. This expansion is expected to support the production of 10 to 13 million all-electric vehicles annually by 2030.

events.name: Planned battery plant projects
events.wd_description: Most of the battery plant projects in North America are scheduled to begin production between 2025 and 2030.
events.description: Most of the battery plant projects in North America are scheduled to begin production between 2025 and 2030.

events.name: Co-location with automotive plants
events.wd_description: Many battery plants will be co-located with automotive plants to optimize supply chain logistics.
events.description: Many battery plants will be co-located with automotive plants to optimize supply chain logistics.

events.name: Concentration of projects in specific states
events.wd_label: Concentration of projects in specific states
events.wd_description: The highest growth in battery manufacturing capacity is expected in Kentucky, Tennessee, Georgia, and Michigan.
events.description: The highest growth in battery manufacturing capacity is expected in Kentucky, Tennessee, Georgia, and Michigan.
